Container.Name: CrashPlan-Desktop
Container.Overview: This is a MATE desktop with CrashPlan Desktop GUI. [br][br] Disclaimer: this is a fork of the excellent work of SparklyBall's desktops.
Container.Description: This is a MATE desktop with CrashPlan Desktop GUI. [br]User/password is ubuntu:PASSWD (case sensitive).[br][br] [b]IMPORTANT:- You have to connect with a remote desktop connection to port 3389.[/b]
